divs: Sighting DetailsWent outside lit a cigarette, saw light too bright to be a star,and stars were not yet visible, got binoculars, took a look saw the object with a ring spinning around it with a dimmer one to the right, it was in the northwest sky. the motion is erratic with the dimmer light mirroring the same erratic behavior as the bright object. I saw a couple of airplanes flying below the object. I'm still observing the object and for the past hour they are in a very slow path north with spinning and erratic movement
Summary: Strange bright light with dim light at 3 oclock erratic motion
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Bangor
There were no other sightings in Bangor on or around May 12th 2012
